Exhausted. No spoons left for today. Kid makes me a to-do list...that's already 10 items long... 😣 #fibro
Why can't anything be made to last a long time...I have a 2 year stint with a phone and the cord might be crapping out with 9 months to go?
Samsung charger cord makes weird swishing noises...that probably isn't good is it?
@Janetmomof31 @Knightlova When Fortis guy came by he said it was possibly a train full of sulfur that had gone thru...
@Knightlova @cityofcoquitlam Just got home now and seems to be gone. @FortisBC any idea what it was from?
@Knightlova @cityofcoquitlam I left home before noon and it was still strong. Haven't had a call from Fortis.
@Knightlova @cityofcoquitlam Yes very strong in Cape Horn area. I called fortis an hour ago.
Less than 12 hours into a new year.. already a death & a medical emergency in my time line...

@Timmc78 haha. My body can't handle the cold and wet.. time to move somewhere tropical.
Done with winter...
Hungry. Popcorn? Nope...Kids used up all the butter (on what I can't figure out). Chips? Nope...Kids ate all but a few crumbs. #Hangry now 😈
